Interests

Beyond immersing myself in the dynamic world of software and tech, I'm a die-hard supporter of the Colorado Avalanche, passionately cheering for my city's sports teams. Alongside my fervor for Formula 1, I even developed a fan app to elevate our fan game from a spreadsheet to a full-fledged web application. When the weather permits, I embrace my love for golf. As a dedicated craft beer enthusiast and enthusiastic cook, I indulge in the culinary arts. My linguistic journey involves daily Japanese practice, aiming to conquer the JLPT.

I find solace in lifting heavy circles off the ground. After a day of coding and learning, my evenings are reserved for engaging conversations and video games with friends scattered across the country.
